description:
Gregory Sunshine has one last inmate to meet; a criminal with incredible powers. Meanwhile, the heroes struggle to neutralize the escaped NEXT.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Genbutsunin ga Mott mo Joukyou o Mite Iru
Lookers-on See Most of the Game.
Lookers-on see most of the game. 見物人が最も状況を見ている
